plot: Nick, a young painter living in New York City, struggles with failure and obscurity. A small lie makes Nick a celebrity overnight, but he soon realizes that his tiny fib comes with a large price tag.
plot_en: Nick, a young painter living in New York City, struggles with failure and obscurity. A small lie makes Nick a celebrity overnight, but he soon realizes that his tiny fib comes with a large price tag.
plot_es: Nick, a young painter living in New York City, struggles with failure and obscurity. A small lie makes Nick a celebrity overnight, but he soon realizes that his tiny fib comes with a large price tag.
title: Artistically Challenged
